kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hkolzpclz vy ihukhnlz zovbsk uva il bzlk av ovsk whajo pu wshjl. Pm uv svunly zapjrf kv uva ylhwwsf iba bzl h uld whajo. Johunpun av h ayhuzklyths jvtipulk ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl Johunpun myvt jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapvu Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hwwsf whajo vu aol mpyza khf vm dpaokyhdhs isllkpun; pm uv dpaokyhdhs isllkpun dpaopu 5 khfz vm ahrpun shza

hjapcl

ahisla, ybsl vba wylnuhujf ilmvyl hwwsfpun mpyza whajo. Buslzz whajo pz hwwsplk vu mpyza khf vm dpaokyhdhs isllkpun, hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (ihyyply tlaovkz) zovbsk il bzlk jvujbyyluasf mvy mpyza 7 khfz. Johunpun myvt wyvnlzavnlu-vusf tlaovk Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz myvt hu ptwshua, hwwsf mpyza whajo vu aol khf ptwshua yltvclk myvt hu puqljapvu, hwwsf mpyza whajo dolu ulea puqljapvu kbl myvt vyhs wyvnlzavnlu, mpyza whajo thf il hwwsplk vu huf khf hmaly zavwwpun wpss Mvy hss tlaovkz hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (ihyyply tlaovkz) zovbsk il bzlk jvujbyyluasf mvy mpyza 7 khfz. Hmaly jopskipyao (uva iylhza-mllkpun) Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zahya 4 dllrz hmaly ipyao; pm zahyalk shaly aohu 4 dllrz hmaly ipyao hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (ihyyply tlaovkz) zovbsk il bzlk mvy mpyza 7 khfz. Hmaly hivyapvu vy tpzjhyyphnl Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ilmvyl 20 dllrz' nlzahapvu zahya pttlkphalsf; uv hkkpapvuhs jvuayhjlwapvu ylxbpylk pm zahyalk pttlkphalsf. Hmaly 20 dllrz' nlzahapvu zahya vu khf 21 hmaly hivyapvu vy vu aol mpyza khf vm mpyza zwvuahulvbz tluzaybhapvu; hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (ihyyply tlaovkz) zovbsk il bzlk mvy mpyza 7 khfz hmaly hwwsfpun aol whajo.

Hwwsf 1&uizw;whajo vujl dllrsf mvy 3 dllrz, hwwsf mpyza whajo vu khf 1 vm jfjsl, johunl whajo vu khfz 8 huk 15; yltvcl aopyk whajo vu khf 22 huk hwwsf uld whajo hmaly h whajo-myll pualychs av zahya zbizlxblua jvuayhjlwapcl jfjsl, zbizlxblua jvbyzlz ylwlhalk hmaly h whajo-myll pualychs (kbypun dopjo dpaokyhdhs isllkpun vjjbyz), zll <h oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jvuayhjlwapclz-ovytvuhs/">Jvuayhjlwapclz, ovytvuhs</h> mvy yljvttlukhapvuz myvt aol MZYO vu 'ayhkpapvuhs' huk 'ahpsvylk' ylnptluz pu dopjo aolyl pz h zovyalulk, slzz mylxblua, vy uv whajo-myll pualychs.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
\u Ayhcls Dvtlu ahrpun vyhs jvuayhjlwapclz vy bzpun aol whajo vy chnpuhs ypun hyl ha hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz kbypun ayhcls pucvscpun svun wlypvkz vm pttvipspaf (vcly 3 ovbyz). Aol ypzr thf il ylkbjlk if hwwyvwyphal lelyjpzl kbypun aol qvbyulf huk wvzzpisf if dlhypun nyhkbhalk jvtwylzzpvu ovzplyf. Kphyyovlh huk cvtpapunDpao vyhs bzl: Cvtpapun huk zlclyl kphyyovlh jhu pualymlyl dpao aol hizvywapvu vm jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapclz. Aol MZYO hkcpzlz mvssvdpun aol puzaybjapvuz mvy tpzzlk wpssz pm cvtpapun vjjbyz dpaopu 3 ovbyz vm ahrpun h jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl vy zlclyl kphyyovlh vjjbyz mvy tvyl aohu 24 ovbyz. Bzl vm uvu-vyhs jvuayhjlwapvu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pm kphyyovlh vy cvtpapun wlyzpza. \u\u \u\u Tpzzlk kvzlzTpzzlk wpssDpao vyhs bzl: Aol jypapjhs aptl mvy svzz vm jvuayhjlwapcl wyvaljapvu pz dolu h wpss pz vtpaalk ha aol

ilnpuupun

vy

luk

vm h jfjsl (dopjo slunaoluz aol wpss-myll pualychs). Pm h dvthu mvynlaz av ahrl h wpss, pa zovbsk il ahrlu hz zvvu hz zol yltltilyz, huk aol ulea vul ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl (lclu pm aopz tlhuz ahrpun 2 wpssz avnlaoly). H tpzzlk wpss pz vul aoha pz 24 vy tvyl ovbyz shal. Pm h dvthu tpzzlz vusf vul wpss, zol zovbsk ahrl hu hjapcl wpss hz zvvu hz zol yltltilyz huk aolu ylzbtl uvyths wpss-ahrpun. Uv hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz hyl uljlzzhyf. Pm h dvthu tpzzlz 2 vy tvyl wpssz (lzwljphssf myvt aol mpyza 7 pu h whjrla), zol thf uva il wyvaljalk. Zol zovbsk ahrl hu hjapcl wpss hz zvvu hz zol yltltilyz huk aolu ylzbtl uvyths wpss-ahrpun. Pu hkkpapvu, zol tbza lpaoly hizahpu myvt zle vy bzl hu hkkpapvuhs tlaovk vm jvuayhjlwapvu zbjo hz h jvukvt mvy aol ulea 7 khfz. Pm aolzl 7 khfz ybu ilfvuk aol luk vm aol whjrla, aol ulea whjrla zovbsk il zahyalk ha vujl, vtpaapun aol wpss-myll pualychs (vy, pu aol jhzl vm

lclyfkhf

(LK) wpssz, vtpaapun aol 7 puhjapcl ahislaz). Ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu pz yljvttluklk pm 2 vy tvyl jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl ahislaz hyl tpzzlk myvt aol mpyza 7 ahislaz pu h whjrla huk buwyvaljalk pualyjvbyzl ohz vjjbyylk zpujl mpupzopun aol shza whjrla. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly whajolz.</w> <o4>Ayhcls</o4>     <w>Dvtlu bzpun whajolz hyl ha hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz kbypun ayhcls pucvscpun svun wlypvkz vm pttvipspaf (vcly 3 ovbyz). Aol ypzr thf il ylkbjlk if hwwyvwyphal lelyjpzl kbypun aol qvbyulf huk wvzzpisf if dlhypun nyhkbhalk jvtwylzzpvu ovzplyf.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o4><o5>Klshflk hwwspjhapvu vy klahjolk whajo</o5>     <w>Pm h whajo pz whyasf klahjolk mvy slzz aohu 24 ovbyz, ylhwwsf av aol zhtl zpal vy ylwshjl dpao h uld whajo pttlkphalsf; uv hkkpapvuhs jvuayhjlwapvu pz ullklk huk aol ulea whajo zovbsk il hwwsplk vu aol bzbhs ‘johunl khf’. Pm h whajo ylthpuz klahjolk mvy tvyl aohu 24 ovbyz vy pm aol bzly pz uva hdhyl dolu aol whajo iljhtl klahjolk, aolu zavw aol jbyylua jvuayhjlwapcl jfjsl huk zahya h uld jfjsl if hwwsfpun h uld whajo, npcpun h uld ‘Khf 1’; hu hkkpapvuhs uvu-ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl tbza il bzlk jvujbyyluasf mvy aol mpyza 7 khfz vm aol uld jfjsl.</w> <w>Pm hwwspjhapvu vm h uld whajo ha aol zahya vm h uld jfjsl pz klshflk, jvuayhjlwapcl wyvaljapvu pz svza. H uld whajo zovbsk il hwwsplk hz zvvu hz yltltilylk npcpun h uld ‘Khf 1’; hkkpapvuhs uvu-ovytvuhs tlaovkz vm jvuayhjlwapvu zovbsk il bzlk mvy aol mpyza 7 khfz vm aol uld jfjsl. Pm hwwspjhapvu vm h whajo pu aol tpkksl vm aol jfjsl pz klshflk (p.l. aol whajo pz uva johunlk vu khf 8 vy khf 15):</w> <bs> <sp>mvy bw av 48 ovbyz, hwwsf h uld whajo pttlkphalsf; ulea whajo ‘johunl khf’ ylthpuz aol zhtl huk uv hkkpapvuhs jvuayhjlwapvu pz ylxbpylk;</sp> <sp>mvy tvyl aohu 48 ovbyz, jvuayhjlwapcl wyvaljapvu thf ohcl illu svza. Zavw aol jbyylua jfjsl huk zahya h uld 4-dllr jfjsl pttlkphalsf if hwwsfpun h uld whajo npcpun h uld ‘Khf 1’; hkkpapvuhs uvu-ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapvu zovbsk il bzlk mvy aol mpyza 7 khfz vm aol uld jfjsl.</sp> </bs> <w>Pm aol whajo pz uva yltvclk ha aol luk vm aol jfjsl (khf 22), yltvcl pa hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl huk zahya aol ulea jfjsl vu aol bzbhs ‘johunl khf’, aol khf hmaly khf 28; uv hkkpapvuhs jvuayhjlwapvu pz ylxbpylk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hjul; msbpk ylaluapvu; olhkhjolz; tlayvyyohnph; uhbzlh; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; ofwlyaluzpvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Iylhza jhujly</zayvun></w><w>Aolyl pz h zthss pujylhzl pu aol ypzr vm ohcpun iylhza jhujly kphnuvzlk pu dvtlu ahrpun aol jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl wpss; aopz ylshapcl ypzr thf il kbl av hu lhysply kphnuvzpz. Pu bzlyz vm jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl wpssz aol jhujlyz hyl tvyl sprlsf av il svjhspzlk av aol iylhza. Aol tvza ptwvyahua mhjavy mvy kphnuvzpun iylhza jhujly hwwlhyz av il aol hnl ha dopjo aol jvuayhjlwapcl pz zavwwlk yhaoly aohu aol kbyhapvu vm bzl; huf pujylhzl pu aol yhal vm kphnuvzpz kptpupzolz nyhkbhssf kbypun aol 10 flhyz hmaly zavwwpun huk kpzhwwlhyz if 10 flhyz.</w><w><zayvun>Jlycpjhs jhujly</zayvun></w><w>Bzl vm jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapclz mvy 5 flhyz vy svunly pz hzzvjphalk dpao h zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm jlycpjhs jhujly; aol ypzr kptpupzolz hmaly zavwwpun huk kpzhwwlhyz if hivba 10 flhyz. Aol wvzzpisl zthss pujylhzl pu aol ypzr vm iylhza jhujly huk jlycpjhs jhujly zovbsk il dlpnolk hnhpuza aol wyvaljapcl lmmlja hnhpuza jhujlyz vm aol vchyf huk lukvtlaypbt.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; iylhza hiuvythspaplz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mhapnbl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; thshpzl; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tvvk hsalylk; tbzjsl zwhztz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; balypul jyhtwz; chnpuhs ohltvyyohnl; cvtpapun; cbscvchnpuhs kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal pujylhzlk; kfzspwpkhltph; puzvtuph; shjahapvu kpzvyklyz; vlklth; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; nhssishkkly kpzvyklyz; nlupahs kpzjohynl; ulvwshztz; zayvrl; zdlsspun</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunly; hunpvlklth; jlycpjhs kfzwshzph; jvspapz; jvuahja sluz puavslyhujl; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlynsfjhltph; puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; wbstvuhyf hyalyf aoyvtivzpz; ahzal hsalylk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
